title: fps glitching
body:
So recently I've been playing league but now my fps goes from like 300 to like 4 fps every other second and it makes the game impossible to play. And my computer is a monster so I have no problem running the game it just keeps going from 300 fps to 4 every other second.
Anyone else have a solution?

replies.body: Capping your FPS could actually help, especially if your pc is a monster.  That and the steps in the [high spec guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs)should tune things up!

My PC is no slouch either and I have tried literally every single in game setting and my fps is doing the same thing. I posted in another thread about this over 2 weeks ago and someone replied saying you were "looking into it" clearly nothing has been done. I have even tried disabling discord overlay and other things but still getting the choppy frame rate and am now getting reported by other players because I can't play as well as I normally would.
Try capping your FPS for now.
